subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Steve Stricker shot a first-round 63, tying the record for a major, to lead the P.G.A. Championship by two shots, while Tiger Woods struggled to a 77.
snippet: Steve Stricker shot a first-round 63, tying the record for a major, to lead the P.G.A. Championship by two shots, while Tiger Woods struggled to a 77.
